mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BBS (SEQ, ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, STATE, REGDATE, VIEWS, ROOT, REPLY_SEQ, BBS_DEPTH) VALUES (NOTICE_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{state}, SYSDATE, #{views}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(#{root}),0)+1 FROM NOTICE_BBS), #{reply_seq}, #{bbs_depth})

INSERT INTO NOTICE_BBS (SEQ, ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, STATE, REGDATE, VIEWS, ROOT, REPLY_SEQ, BBS_DEPTH) VALUES (NOTICE_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{state}, SYSDATE, #{views}, (SELECT ROOT FROM NOTICE_BBS WHERE SEQ = #{seq}), (SELECT REPLY_SEQ FROM NOTICE_BBS WHERE SEQ = #{seq}) +1), (SELECT BBS_DEPTH FROM NOTICE_BBS WHERE SEQ = #{seq}) +1);
